name: Apple Picker (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player, using the game basket, must catch apples that randomly fall from the tree.
  • The game is controlled by the gaming mouse. Left and right.
  • Player has 3 life.
  • If a player has scored a record number of points, then his score is saved.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Apple-Picker

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
